description: Men's 160 g long-sleeve, 16.5 microns 100% Australian Merino wool jersey. Knitted from the finest Merino wool so that it does not itch or scratch.The jersey is best suited as a first layer on cold days. The raglan cut sleeve and flat seams enhance comfort while wearing. The outstanding properties of Merino wool guarantee that the jersey remains free of any odour, even after it is worn for a long time.
name: Lasting Merino VPO Atar 100% Merino Wool LS Shirt - Mens
